application.name: apollowarp
application.brief: Warp an image to another using control points
application.description: This program warps Apollo images using the reseau information. (note: findapollorx must be run first).

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: Use this parameter to select the filename. All bands within the file will be warped unless a specific band is specified.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: This file will contain the results of the warping.

parameter.name: DEGREE
parameter.description: The order of the polynomial to be used in the linear regression fit.

parameter.name: WEIGHTED
parameter.brief: Weight the control points using distance
parameter.description: The control points will be weighted based on distance if this option is selected. If it is not selected, all control points will have a weight of 1, reguardless of distance.

parameter.name: INTERPOLATION
parameter.description: This is the type of interpolation to be performed on the input.

option.description: Each output pixel will be set to the pixel nearest the calculated input pixel.
Each output pixel will be set to the value calculated by a bi-linear interpolation of the calculated input pixel.
Each output pixel will be set to the value calculated by a cubic convolution interpolation of the calculated input pixel.
